pages.text: Some say that Bark is the most magically potent part of the tree, so early witches learned to strip bark from wood using an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)Athame$().$(br2)$(o)Do note that some woods are simply too hard to strip Bark from.$()

Bark can be used for many things, one of those being Wood Ash.$(br2)Wood Ash is created by putting Bark on a Campfire. When thrown into a filled $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)Witch Cauldron$(), it will immediately empty it.
